title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.51 - Temperature requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.51 - Temperature requirements

State Regulations

Transport vehicles are to be provided with heated and refrigerated facilities that will maintain potentially hazardous food at 140° F (60° C) or above, or 45° F (7.2° C) or below, while in transit. Thermometers accurate to plus or minus 2° F (1.1° C) are to be provided to show the temperature in the coldest part of the hot storage facility and the warmest part of the cold storage facility. Notes

14-5.51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
